description: Compares two (or more) affine spatial transformations on a dataset and outputs measurements of their differences in spatial displacements.

mask.title: Mask
mask.description: Dataset containing non-zero voxels used as the region over which to compare the affine transformations.

dset.title: Dataset
dset.description: Dataset to compute an automask from it and use that mask as the spatial region for comparison.

affine.title: Affine transformation
affine.description: Input an affine transformation (file or 'MATRIX'). Multiple '-affine' options can be used to input multiple files.
